text: Hi, how are you today?
i'm good. how are you? are you ready for your 3 day weekend?
I'm good, I'm never ready when I should be , haha
luckily i don't have to really do much, so what brings you here today?
Well, how do you feel about charity's like Save the Children? Do you donate often?
I haven't donated to them but i'm sympathetic to their cause
Would you ever consider donating?
Do you know what the donations go to? i'm not very well versed on the details

Sure, they go to many things well, revolving around children anyway. Some of their funding goes to the refugee children who are going hungry, without education, and medical help. They go to children who have been through natural disasters to help them and their families rebuild the communities like the most recent hurrican in Texas. They also fund programs for inner city kids to have a safe haven while continuing their education.
are you a supporter / donor?
Yes, I've donated reguarly, most of the time I wish I could do more but even the smallest amounts help.... even pennies add up if there's enough ::)
i would think about donating something at some point.
Well, today the research team are giving all of us the oppurtunity to donate some of our bonus money if we are interested in doing so....
how much have you donated today? or intend to donate today?
I'm going to donate $.25 of mine like I said it's not much but something is better then nothing at least that's what I've been told since I was a kid :)
can you tell me anything else about save the children?

Well, they're a international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. And all of the donations they recieve go towards the children unlike other charities who only donate a portion.
okay, id be willing to donate 30 cents to them.
See, $.25 has now turned in $.55 almost the price of a candy bar ;)
thats true, :) if only everyone else did it too, that 55 cents would go really far
